EmailTemplate.description: Long Island, NY Partnership Dialogue Series Follow Up/Thank You
EmailTemplate.name: Long Island, NY Partnership Dialogue Series Follow Up/Thank You Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you you for attending American Student Assistance's Long Island, NY Partnership Dialog Series: A Focus on Communication
Date: April 16,2008 Time: 8:00am-1:00pm Location: Long Island Marriott Hotel & Conference Center
It was a pleasure to see so many friendly faces.
Please contact us at training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions
Check our website for future events. http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/index.cfm
We look forward to seeing you again!
